Title: University of Sydney AGRTP Scholarship 2026, Australia (Fully Funded)
Description: Scholarships in AustraliaUniversity of Sydney AGRTP Scholarship 2026, Australia (Fully Funded)ByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-May 12, 2025
Eligibility:
The University of Sydney RTP Scholarship is open to all Nationals.You canonly applyfor the RTP Scholarship if you havereceived an offerinto a higher degree by research program.You can find the HDR Degree programsin this listDevelop your research proposal and find a supervisor. Before you submit your application, you must first secure a supervisor.Followthis guideon how to make a research proposal.A bachelor’s degree is required to apply for a master’s by research.A master’s degree is required to apply for a PhD in research.You also need to meet the English Language Requirements.

Title: 600 University of Melbourne Graduate Research Scholarship 2025
Description: Scholarships in Australia600 University of Melbourne Graduate Research Scholarship 2025ByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-July 9, 2024
Eligibility:
The scholarship is open to both Australian and International applicants.For new applicants: An Applicant must have applied for a graduate research degree at the University of Melbourne. If selected, you will beautomatically consideredfor the scholarship.Applicants who are already enrolled in a graduate research degree can also apply.

Title: Deakin University Australia RTP Scholarship 2025 (Fully Funded)
Description: Scholarships in AustraliaDeakin University Australia RTP Scholarship 2025 (Fully Funded)ByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-May 19, 2024
Eligibility:
To be eligible for the Deakin University RTP Scholarship:
An applicant must be an international or domestic student.An applicant must have an offer or be enrolled in an HDR course of study at Deakin University.To be eligible for the scholarship an applicant must not receive income from another source to support if that income is greater than 75 percent of that student’s RTP.Students of the RTP scholarship will be enrolled as on-campus full-time students.Completed at least 4 years of undergraduate degree program.Meet all the admission requirements andHigher Degrees by Research (HDR) Admission, Selection and Enrolment Procedure
Degree Offered: Master by Research, PhD by Research

Title: ANU University Research Scholarship 2024-25, Australia (Fully Funded)
Description: Scholarships in AustraliaANU University Research Scholarship 2024-25, Australia (Fully Funded)ByMuhammad Saim Rasheed-May 6, 2024
Eligibility: The scholarship is open to national and international students seeking admission to the HDR Program.The award will be automatically given after completing and securing admission to the university.The scholarship will be given based on Academic Record, Research Potential, support from the prospective supervisor, Referee reports, and English Language competency.
